main.name: Vivek Malhan
main.description: Full Stack Developer by Day, Pentester, Coffee Coder and RJ by night
main.bio: My name is Vivek, I'm a Full Stack Developer. Currently I'm working with Publicis Sapient while developing, maintaining and testing some of the most fascinating projects. Hey don't just presume me as another computer geek. I am also a part time RJ at a regional radio station while also spreading knowledge via youtube
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details

resume.skillmessage: Here are some of my notable skills I have experience with.

education.degree: Bachelors in Technology of Computer Science and Engineering
education.description: I completed my degree in computer science and engineering with development of projects including Online College Portals (Moodle), Hostel Management system(HMS), Locus (Location based services - cross platfrom mobile apllication) and many more

work.title: Associate Technology L1 - Core XT
work.description: Recently joined Publicis Sapient Information Technology & Services. In pursuit of reducing the gap between Now and Next. I am working as a member of India core XT working as a full cycle developer on latest technologies based like Next js, google analytics, React, Angular, Html, css, js, Node.js, J-Query

work.title: Development Intern​ Executive & React Specialist
work.description: Developing non discrete projects as an intern. Working on the following  technologies: React js, Express js, Electron js, AWS, Firebase, Nats.io, Stripe, SASS, React toasts, I18next translations Youtube integration, Google maps. Chart js and more.

work.title: Development Intern​ Executive & React Specialist
work.description: Developed a non discrete product as an intern. Working on the following technologies: React js, MongoDB, Express js, Node js, Moment js, Chart js, Mobile Phone authentication, AWS, Firebase, Big Blue Button, Jitsi.

work.title: Team Member
work.description: Developing open source projects with association of technical society of the college, required by college authorities, mostly web based applications. Working on the following technologies: Php, vanilla js, Apache servers, mysql, drupal, django, Big  Blue Button, jitsi meet, Moodle.

testimonials.text: Famously known as The Night Crawler in the team, you assign him a task in evening by next morning scrum he will come up and say it's done.
testimonials.user: Vishnumoorthi Bhat   {Manager Agile Programming Management, Publicis Sapient}

testimonials.text: Quick and keen learner, Helpful and informative.
Always lends a helping hand, Eager to learn and is a quick learn with diverse knowledge.
testimonials.user: Arshdeep Singh   {Full Stack Dev, Invent Consultancy Services}
